name.ja: <ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>凱<rt>がい</rt></ruby><ruby>歌<rt>か</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: If you have no cards in your Extra Deck, send 1 monster with 2000 or 2400 ATK/1000 DEF from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Draw 2 cards. Then, you can shuffle up to 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
